reviewText: Just plain funny from good ol' Don Knotts!  Great actor, family friendly, entertaining for all ages.  Four great movies in one set at a good price!  Wish there were still movies like this made today.  DVD's played just fine.  Glad we purchased and would do so again!
summary: What Else Is There To Say???
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: I bought this collection for my husband who is a big fan of Don Knotts. He enjoys sitting down to old shows of yester years.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: Here are four movies featuring Don Knotts and Tim Conway in the 2 Apple Dumpling Gang movies plus 2 other movies.  Great buy for the money.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: Silly as ever. No nuanced performances here. I've since decided to boycott the Disney Corporation for reasons to not be discussed here. Let's just I'm glad I hp support when I earned my Eagle.
summary: We used to call him Don Nuts--and that pretty much sums it up. Bless his heart!
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: It's Don Knotts!  what else can you say.  FUNNY !!  add Tim Conway.  FUNNIER!  Good clean humor and fun.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: I love Don Knotts and most of what he's done.  This features four films.  Both Apple Dumpling movies, Cold Feet And Hot Lead and Gus (the football plating donkey).  Knotts is wonderful in all of these and a delight to visit with over and over again.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: Two of the funniest men ever.  Each movie is wonderful entertainment.  We could watch it over & over.  And, do sometimes.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: I just purchased this set because my copies of Apple Dumpling gang and Apple Dumpling gang rides again stopped working (they were among the oldest dvds in my collection) and when I saw this set I purchased it right away because it not only features those movies but two other movies I don't have in my collection. FYI walmart sells this set for $12 and best buy for $14.If you wanted to purchase each movie individually you'll spend 38.04 before taxes.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: Don Knotts had such a unique ability to always entertain. All four of the movies in this collection are priceless.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: I like purchasing sets that hold more than one movie. The movies played great. I wish there were movies made like this today.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: Don Knotts is a great actor and we love his characters, especially, the western kind. Some of his movies we watch over and over - they are so hilarious and witty!  Great for family movie night!
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: I love old comedy folks like Don Knotts would nail it on the head every time for those of you whose never seen these two movies you should check them out.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: Don Knotts movies never get old.  They are good for the young and old.  We can watch them over and over and they never get old.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: Don Knotts does not appear as a major character in the first "Apple Dumpling Gang" but Disney finally figures outand gives Knotts & Conway starring roles in the the 2nd "Apple Dumpling Rides Again."As for the last 2 DVDs "Hot Lead & Cold Feet" and "Gus" Don Knotts is barely in it.I think in "Gus" Knotts appears less & not as funny.Tim Conway in "Gus" is teamed up w/ Tom Bosely and never appears w/ Knotts. How can Disney do that! It's likeseparating Abbott & Costello, Laurel & Hardy, Andy & Barney.Glad I only paid $9.99 it didn't feel so bad.You want some good Don Knotts laughs pick up "Don Knotts Reluctant Hero" Pack.You get The Ghost And Mr. Chicken / The Reluctant Astronaut / The Shakiest Gun In The West / The Love God?Or the first 5 seasons of Andy Griffith Show.
summary: Pick up "Don Knotts Reluctant Hero" Pack
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: The only two movies I was after were the apple dumpling gang 1 & 2, but the other two weren't bad.  Don Knotts movies are generally dependable that way.  Still, for what I paid, it was a great deal.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: I've had these movies on VHS tape for years so I decided to get it on DVD. I enjoy watching it every year or so.. it's that good.
summary: Don Knotts - Always a great comedian
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: I chose this rating because I've always enjoyede Don Knotts. I like his movies because he makes me laugh. Sometimes he reminds me a little of myself. I would recommend this movie to anyone who enjoys light hearted movies with bumbling actors.
summary: I enjoy a clean movie that makes me laugh.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: I love Don Knotts.  He could just stand there and I would laugh.  All of the movies are funny and well done.  Great family movie.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: These movies are very family oriented...a little "corny" but great to watch with the kids or grandkids.  Many "belly laughs" at the antics of these notable comics.  They arrived promptly and in excellent condition.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: Loved getting these oldies but goodies with Don Knotts...he is very good in all of these movies..would highly recommend them
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: Nothing can beat a good Don Knotts Comedy back then he was one of the best comedians alive along with Tim Conway whom also was a great comedian, which we surely lack these days, most of the comedy today isn't comedy at all compared to these types of comedians and actors of their time you just cannot top the classic comedians at all.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: I have these movies already. Saw them with my father years ago. He loves them. They are well worth watching...fun, fun, and more fun for the family.
summary: Giving it as a gift to my father for his birthday. He will love these.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)

reviewText: Great Family Movies!!!  Love Don Knotts movies!  He was so funny and I LOVE the Apple Dumpling Gang movies!!  Definitely recommend this set!!
summary: Great Family Movies for the WHOLE FAMILY!!!
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Don Knotts (Apple Dumpling Gang / Apple Dumpling Rides Again / Gus / Hot Lead & Cold Feet)
